name: Grease, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one object/2 levels or 1 10-ft. square/2 levels; see text
text: This spell functions like grease, except as noted here. When you use this spell to cover a solid surface with slippery grease, the 10-foot squares must form a continuous area, each part of which must be within the spell's range. When you use this spell to create a greasy coating on items, no two of the targeted items can be more than 30 feet apart. You cannot target both items and surfaces with a single casting of this spell.
target_zh: 一个物体/2等级或1个10平方呎/2等级；见下文
text_zh: 这种法术如同油腻术（Grease），除了这里所提到的。当你用这个法术在固体表面复盖上滑脂时，10平方英呎的方格必须形成一个连续的区域，每个部分都必须在法术距离内。当你用这个法术在物品上制造一层油腻涂层时，两个目标物品之间不可以超过30英呎。你不能只通过施展一次该法术就既影响物品又影响表面。
